Intro: TATA CHEMICALS dropped sixteen rupees on Friday, should you buy on the drop?
Sum: Tata Chem has a good P/E and a good RSI, it has only 20% moving averages but both MACDs are showing bullish, and it has relatively fine 1 year returns. Also its price target is fantastic. It should be a good asset in your portfolio.
Title: This stock hasn't moved much in the past 5 years. But now it goes 8% up to its 52W High. Should you buy shares of the Indian Tobacco Company?
